history.proof: hfcrush use: expe_top_z, succ_exd_A, top_A, MA0.expo_symm unfold: expe.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero z -> expe m (top m zero z) (A m zero z)

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
expe = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => MA0.expo m z t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
expe_top_z : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expe m z (top m zero z)
expe_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let m0 := L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x) in expe m0 z t < -> expe m z t
betweene_bottom_x_top : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> betweene m (bottom m zero x) x (top m zero x)
bottom_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (H : inv_hmap m), succ m zero x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> let m0 := L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x) in bottom m0 zero z = (if MA0.expo_dec m x z H then A m zero x else bottom m zero z)
planar_L_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> planar m < -> planar (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x))
genus_L_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> genus (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x)) = genus m
nf_L_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> nf (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x)) = nf m
top_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (H : inv_hmap m), succ m zero x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> let m0 := L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x) in top m0 zero z = (if MA0.expo_dec m x z H then x else top m zero z)
expe_bottom_z : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA0.expo m (bottom m zero z) z
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
F_1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => A m zero (A m one z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cF_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cF (B m k x) z = (if eq_dim_dec k zero then cA_1 (B m zero x) one (if eq_dart_dec (A m zero x) z then top m zero x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m zero x) z then x else cA_1 m zero z) else if eq_dart_dec (A m one x) (cA_1 (B m one x) zero z) then top m one x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m one x) (cA_1 (B m one x) zero z) then x else cA_1 m one (cA_1 (B m one x) zero z))
not_succ_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k (top m k z)
A_1_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z
not_expe_bottom_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x' x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m x' -> let m0 := B m zero x' in ~ expe m x' x -> bottom m0 zero x = bottom m zero x
exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z)
bottom_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> bottom m k (A m k z) = bottom m k z
expe_top : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA0.expo m z t -> top m zero z = top m zero t
expe_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA0.expo m z t -> bottom m zero z = bottom m zero t
cA_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
bottom_top_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z
top_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z
expf_expf_B : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let y := A m zero x in let x0 := bottom m zero x in ~ expf m y x0 -> expf m z t -> expf (B m zero x) z t
cF_1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA m zero (cA m one z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
disconnect_planar_criterion_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> succ m zero x -> let y := A m zero x in let x0 := bottom m zero x in expf m y x0 < -> ~ eqc (B m zero x) x y
succ_zi : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m zero z -> (i + 1 < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat -> let zi := Iter (MA0.f m) i z in succ m zero zi
face_cut_join_criterion_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let y := A m zero x in let x0 := bottom m zero x in expf m y x0 < -> ~ expf (B m zero x) y x0
other_faces_in_cut_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let y := A m zero x in let x0 := bottom m zero x in ~ expf m y x0 -> ~ expf m y z -> ~ expf m x0 z -> expf m z t < -> expf (B m zero x) z t

```coq
intros m z Hinv Hsucc.
rewrite <- (expe_top_z m z Hinv).
replace (top m zero z) with (A m zero (top m zero z)).
apply expe_L_B_top_bot.
auto.
rewrite <- (bottom_L_B_top_bot m x z Hinv Hsucc).
rewrite <- (top_L_B_top_bot m x z Hinv Hsucc).
auto.
Qed.```

original: intros m z Hinv Hsucc. rewrite <- (expe_top_z m z Hinv). replace (top m zero z) with (A m zero (top m zero z)). apply expe_L_B_top_bot. auto. rewrite <- (bottom_L_B_top_bot m x z Hinv Hsucc). rewrite <- (top_L_B_top_bot m x z Hinv Hsucc). auto.
